# Aadiyan Dubey - Full Stack Developer Portfolio (Full Context)

## About Aadiyan Dubey

Aadiyan Dubey is a Full Stack Developer and B.Tech Computer Science & Engineering student at the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Nagaland, India. He specializes in building modern web applications using React, TypeScript, Node.js, and AI integration.

## Technical Skills

### Frontend
- React, TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+)
- Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Three.js
- HTML5, CSS3, Responsive Design

### Backend
- Node.js, Express.js
- Supabase, PostgreSQL
- REST APIs, Edge Functions

### Tools & Platforms
- Git, GitHub, VS Code
- Vite, Webpack
- Vercel, Netlify

### AI & Integration
- AI-powered applications
- OpenAI API, Gemini API
- Natural Language Processing

## Projects

### VishwaGuru.site
A full-stack web platform built with modern technologies including React, Node.js, and Supabase.

## Education

- **B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering** - National Institute of Technology (NIT) Nagaland

## Contact

- **Website**: https://portfolio.vishwaguru.site
- **Location**: India

## Portfolio Features

This portfolio website itself demonstrates Aadiyan's technical capabilities:
- Interactive 3D particle backgrounds using Three.js and React Three Fiber
- AI-powered chat assistant (Clementine) for visitor interaction
- Dynamic content management via admin panel
- Full SEO optimization with structured data (JSON-LD)
- Progressive Web App (PWA) support
- Responsive design across all devices
- Dynamic sitemap generation
- Theme customization system

## How to Reach

Visit the contact page at https://portfolio.vishwaguru.site/contact to send a message or discuss collaboration opportunities.
